sense.def:
To be certain
pomeni biti prepričan in brez vsakega dvoma.

seg.quote: He felt certain that she would disapprove.
Such a vote would mean the certain defeat of the government.

sense.def:
Z besedo
certain
nakažemo, da govorimo o neki določeni stvari, osebi ali skupini, ne da bi natanko povedali, o kateri.

seg.quote: She arranged to meet him at three o'clock on a certain afternoon.
Certain areas in Sussex are better than others for keeping bees.
Certain of our judges have claimed that this is the case.

sense.def:
Če nekaj vemo
for certain
, o tistem ne dvomimo.

seg.quote: It is not known for certain where they are now.

sense.def:
Če človek
makes certain
, da se bo nekaj zgodilo, poskrbi, da se tisto v resnici zgodi.

Če nekaj storimo ali dosežemo
to a certain extent
, tisto storimo ali dosežemo samo delno.

seg.quote: That takes care of my anxieties to a certain extent.
